formula: a(n) =a(n-1)+A061007(n) =A061009(n)+2. For n>3, a(n)=pi(n)+2 where pi(n)=A000720(n) is the number of primes less than or equal to n.
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k,w; a:=0; print(a); for i from 1 by 1 to n do w:=((i-1)! mod (i+1)); a:=a+w; print(a); od; end: P(1000); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Apr 23 2007
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 12 2001
